main.name: Pritish Biswas
main.description: Results-driven Web Developer with expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and emerging AI applications in web development.
main.bio: Hi there! I am Pritish Biswas, a passionate Web Developer with strong skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and backend technologies like Node.js and Express.js. I have a strong problem-solving mindset and an eye for detail, ensuring seamless user experiences in my projects. As an active contributor to open-source programs like GSSoC and SSOC, I enjoy collaborating with the developer community. My experience includes real-time monitoring solutions, AI-powered healthcare assistants, and environmental monitoring projects. I'm always eager to learn and innovate!
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me for collaboration and exciting projects!

education.school: Institute Of Technical Education and Research
education.degree: Bachelor of Technology, Computer Science And Engineering

testimonials.text: Pritish is a highly skilled developer with an eye for detail. His projects show deep technical expertise and problem-solving skills.
Working with Pritish has been an excellent experience. His ability to quickly learn and implement complex solutions is impressive!
